Pre-Game Insights: Both Australia and Pakistan haven't had the best starts in the tournament and are aiming for a win at a high-scoring venue.
Australia will enter the match after their first win against Sri Lanka, while Pakistan lost to India in their previous game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru has produced great batting tracks with an average score of 266.
The pitch allows fast bowlers to get swing and spinners to get turn as the match progresses.
Others: Australia's playing XI includes Mitchell Marsh, David Warner, Steven Smith, Marnus Labuschagne, Josh Inglis, Glenn Maxwell, Marcus Stoinis, Mitchell Starc, Pat Cummins, Adam Zampa, and Josh Hazlewood.
Pakistan's playing XI includes Abdullah Shafique, Imam-ul-Haq, Babar Azam, Mohammad Rizwan, Saud Shakeel, Iftikhar Ahmed, Shadab Khan, Mohammad Nawaz, Hasan Ali, Shaheen Afridi, and Haris Rauf.
